    B

    BaseBoundary - Class in boundary
    Base class for console UI boundaries providing common input/output helpers and a reference to the AuthController when available.
    BaseBoundary() - Constructor for class boundary.BaseBoundary
    Creates a boundary without authentication support.
    BaseBoundary(AuthController) - Constructor for class boundary.BaseBoundary
    Creates a boundary with an Authentication controller.
    BaseController - Class in controller
    Base class for controllers providing shared repository access and common validation helpers.
    BaseController(StudentRepository, CompanyRepRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, InternshipRepository, ApplicationRepository, WithdrawalRequestRepository) - Constructor for class controller.BaseController
    Constructs a controller with the repositories it needs.
    BASIC - Enum constant in enum class entity.InternshipLevel
    Entry-level internship position suitable for beginners.
    boundary - package boundary
    Contains the boundary classes that handle console interaction with users.
